title: Requires medical assistance to be provided to victims of domestic violence to care for and treat any scarring resulting from the domestic violence incident
summary: Requires medical assistance be provided to victims of domestic violence, as defined in section 457-a of this chapter, to care for and treat any scarring from the domestic violence incident.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to providing medical assistance to needy persons for the care and treatment of scarring resulting from domestic abuse
